name: Fungiosis
description:
You are fungi - nourish the forest with water and minerals and in return they will feed you with the Sun's energy. 

Grow and thrive, the forest is counting on it

This game was a collaboration built for the Epic MegaJam 2022 by:

Andy Cantrell (Weirdos Klamber)

Lazaros S (Lazo)

Zack Turman  - https://www500.itch.io/
